description: Detective investigations lets you investigate IAM users and IAM roles using indicators of compromise. An indicator of compromise (IOC) is an artifact observed in or on a network, system, or environment that can (with a high level of confidence) identify malicious activity or a security incident. StartInvestigation initiates an investigation on an entity in a behavior graph.

parameters.name: GraphArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the behavior graph.

parameters.name: EntityArn
parameters.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM user and IAM role.

parameters.name: ScopeStartTime
parameters.description: The data and time when the investigation began. The value is an UTC ISO8601 formatted string. For example, 2021-08-18T16:35:56.284Z.

parameters.name: ScopeEndTime
parameters.description: The data and time when the investigation ended. The value is an UTC ISO8601 formatted string. For example, 2021-08-18T16:35:56.284Z.

nested_items.name: InvestigationId
nested_items.description: The investigation ID of the investigation report.
